Author: Slimdaddy
Title: [ANN][PRE-SALE] charitySPACE - place where you can help others and win a prize
Body: Charity projects have all been overlooked by the crypto-community for a long time. The most common reason people gave was that it doesn't have a way of generating profits for investors. Some say it's difficult for the token to add value.  I just hope CharitySpace can change all that.

Author: charitySPACE
Title: [ANN][PRE-SALE] charitySPACE - place where you can help others and win a prize
Body: Thank you and I apologize for the misunderstanding. Every opinion is valuable to us. The current ICO model is our business vision. We've thought about it for a long time. Let it stay as it is Thank you.   Quote from: Slimdaddy on December 16, 2017, 11:44:41 PM Charity projects have all been overlooked by the crypto-community for a long time. The most common reason people gave was that it doesn't have a way of generating profits for investors. Some say it's difficult for the token to add value.  I just hope CharitySpace can change all that.  You're right. However, you must understand that we are not a "token". The basic difference is that our charity is the charitySPACE internet platform. We do not issue a charity token. We issue a token that will be used to take part in entertainment. The entertainment is the participation in the prize draw. This is our charity vision. You will not support the needy with this token. But you can pay for participating in the prize draw. There have been many opinions that this is not pure charity. Of course it is not. However, our answer is: it is better to donate 200 ETH to UNICEF and take 30% of it for the prize and commission than give them 0 ETH.  We want to create a product whose slogan is: "we bring people together, we do public collection, we collected 200 ETH, we donated 160 ETH from this pool to the needy, 60 ETH (30% of 200 ETH) is an award for our donors and our commission" - how can this not be a charity action ?  Many people ask what our commission is for. The answer is simple. Most of the funds from ICO are allocated to the production of charitySPACE. The rest is marketing and building the brand image. The commission is the current maintenance of the company. Many people ask why the prize for the winner is as much as 25%. The answer is also simple. It must be attractive. Not everyone on a daily basis helps those in need. According to our data, it is 20% of the population. Not much true? Our product is to aggregate the remaining 80% (our dreams ) or more real - if we reach 20-30% from the crypto community - it will be a success for us.  We try to be very transparent.  You must understand that we do not create a token. We create a platrorm, to help those in need.

Author: VSOP_VSOP
Title: [ANN][PRE-SALE] charitySPACE - place where you can help others and win a prize
Body: Spent a little time studying the project because it interested me with its simplicity and clarity, or instead - all very confusing. I would like to understand. Proceeds from the token sale is a charity. The platform itself works on the basis of smartcontract Ethereum. After collecting only one Ethereum address will receive 25% of the fees. How the address is determined? Is this one-time ICO event and only one-time winner? Or the platform will run with a certain periodicity?

Author: charitySPACE
Title: [ANN][PRE-SALE] charitySPACE - place where you can help others and win a prize
Body: ICO is organized as standard. We do not allocate funds from the sale of a token to charity. These funds are intended for the development of the charitySPACE platform. On this online platform, charity donations will be organized. Everything is based on ethereum smart contract. From among persons participating in a single collection, the contract (algorithm) draws one, two or three people who will win (25%). 5% is our commission, we exchange 70% for FIAT on the public stock exchange and transfer it via an arbitrator to a charity.

Author: charitySPACE
Title: [ANN][PRE-SALE] charitySPACE - place where you can help others and win a prize
Body: ICO is suspended!  We changed the start date.  New CROWDSALE will start on APRIL 16, 2018  Due to fluctuating exchange rates of Ethereum and Bitcoin, which are inconvenient for our investors, we decided to suspend ICO. The cryptocurrency market was characterized by a high degree of instability from November to December 2017. We believe that the situation will stabilize in the next few months, therefore, we postpone the ICO for 16 Apil 2018. This decision is difficult for us, however, after deep reflections, we do not see a different solution at the moment. We are not able to guarantee a satisfactory return on investment in our project at this moment. Daily fluctuations in the currency rates, which are close to 25%, distort our business model. We believe that the market will come back to its stability, and then we will launch our project again. All current forecasts inform it is a matter of a maximum of three months.  We would like to thank you for your interest in charitySPACE. Please, stay tuned. We are going to be back in 2018! Stronger with new experiences and heads full of new ideas. Perhaps by this time, we will enrich charitySPACE with new ideas. At the same time, we would like to inform you that all people involved in our bounty campaign will be appreciated by us with a 100% bonus in the new campaign.  We would like to ask for your understanding. - The charitySPACE team

Author: kotwica666
Title: [ANN][PRE-SALE] charitySPACE - place where you can help others and win a prize
Body: Good question. Do you already know who you want to help? Are you going to establish permanent cooperation with specific institutions or help centers?

Author: charitySPACE
Title: [ANN][PRE-SALE] charitySPACE - place where you can help others and win a prize
Body: Quote from: kotwica666 on December 06, 2017, 04:19:38 PM     Good question. Do you already know who you want to help? Are you going to establish permanent cooperation with specific institutions or help centers?    Of course we know who we want to help We are deeply convinced that man is a human being. Maybe you should ask a question - what does it matter to whom we want to help? The fact of help is important. Our mission is to gather capital from the Crypto market and hand it over to other people in need.  However, we are aware that our users (donors) have a need to choose the organization we have received.  At the beginning (according to the roadmap), we focus on the European market. In addition to our native Polish charity foundations, we inform more well-known foundations about our project. E.g:  UNICEF (unicef.org), World Food Program (wfp.org), Save the Children (savethechildren.org), British Oxfam (oxfam.org.uk), French Action Contre la Faim (actionagainsthunger.org), and other more local  An interesting project is GiveDirectly.org. The organization, looking at satellite photos, chooses the poorest families in Kenya and Uganda (those whose roofs are not covered with sheet metal) and checks them. The chosen person transfers money in the banking system using a mobile phone. Indirect costs are low, so from every dollar of donors, as much as 91 cents goes to the poor.  We are also planning to introduce the functionality that allows you as users to submit your organization proposals that we would like to support.  There is a lot of potential for the development of our platform. Do not forget, however, that the primary goal is to support all people in need. All these organizations, even if we gathered 500 of them, certainly will not waste this money.  The markets of the USA and Canada are probably the end of 2018. Mid-2018 is Russia, Japan. Because these countries have their own organizations operating only and exclusively within their territories.

Author: charitySPACE
Title: [ANN][PRE-SALE] charitySPACE - place where you can help others and win a prize
Body: Only the pre-sale has a specific duration. From December 20 to 27, or if we sell 2 500,000 CHT. If we do not sell 2,500,000 CHT by December 27, the remaining unsold tokens will be burned. Then we start SALE I. It lasts until we sell 3,000,000 CHT (for 1 CHT = 0.001 ETH). If we sell 3 000 000 CHT in SALE I will automatically start SALE II for which we have reserved 3 500 000 CHT (1 CHT = 0.0015 ETH). The only time limit is the contract, which expires on January 20, 2018. Regardless of how much we sell until January 20 - the remaining tokens will be burned after January 20.  The ETH contract is available here: https://github.com/CharitySPACE/ICOContract  Please remember that all our calculations on the site were made at the price of $ 300 for 1 ETH. Today, the price is twice as high. We wonder what to do about it. We've already given up supporting Dash. We currently collect in BTC, BCC, ETH, LTC  Quote from: b3j0 on December 16, 2017, 03:32:50 AM I really like the concept applied in this project. The concept applied in this project is very easy to understand and has a very interesting look. today human welfare is so bad I hope this project will help solve humanitarian problems in different parts of the world.  We also hope so. Thank you for your support.

Author: charitySPACE
Title: [ANN][PRE-SALE] charitySPACE - place where you can help others and win a prize
Body: Quote from: eprocent on December 16, 2017, 03:37:51 PM If in the smart contract there is a deadline of January 20, I think setting the token distribution period in ICO must be set as the time period, so that it is possible to raise the necessary funds. If pre-sale sells only 2,500,000 tokens at the best price, then you can sell 13,500,000 by January 20 at a higher price, it must begin immediately after the pre-sales period. It is unlikely that you sell 13,500,000 tokens in an undetermined start-up period, but after December 27 in the context in which smart-contract January 20 is the deadline. Otherwise I appreciate the idea of the project and sincerely I wish very successful.  I admit honestly, I do not understand the problem you described. I will try to explain it, as I understood. I apologize if my answer is not satisfactory for you.  PRE-SALE is part of ICO. It will last from 20 to 27 December. It is likely that it will last shorter. If we sell 2,500,000 tokens - the pre-sale will end. The ICO runs from December 27 (then we start selling SALE I).  All dates are specified  If you have any questions, I am at your disposal.

Author: charitySPACE
Title: [ANN][PRE-SALE] charitySPACE - place where you can help others and win a prize
Body: Yes, we are planning to introduce our token to the stock exchange. We know from experience that this process is time-consuming. That's why we do it now. The CHT Token will be listed on the world's leading stock exchanges of cryptocurrency. The primary purpose of the CHT token is to make payments within the charitySPACE internet platform that organizes charitable collections.  Directly after ICO - in January 2018 - we plan start beta version of the charitySPACE platform. Basic functionality (ETH collections only, ETH prizes only). In third quarter of the year we will launching charitySPACE.net mobile platform (Android / iOS native app). In the meantime, we will expand the area of activity to Japanese and Russian-speaking markets.

Author: charitySPACE
Title: [ANN][PRE-SALE] charitySPACE - place where you can help others and win a prize
Body: Yes it's true. Thank you.  That is why our project was created. We believe that the market is ready for this solution. This project is created by people, for people.

Author: charitySPACE
Title: [ANN][PRE-SALE] charitySPACE - place where you can help others and win a prize
Body: Thank you!  It is a system built on the Ethereum smart contract. The basic layer of the system is a website. However, this is only the view and user interface. The entire system is based on the Ethereum contract. All collections and draws winners are guaranteed by the contract. The contract is public and open. Transfer of funds to both the winner and the recipient is also handled by the contract.  The project is oriented to helping the needy. We do not see any other option except that we will be completely transparent. Blockchain is the only right solution in this project.

Author: tianyi321
Title: [ANN][PRE-SALE] charitySPACE - place where you can help others and win a prize
Body: The process of donation is transparent, it can be easily done, but how to guarantee the use of the donation is also transparent?

Author: charitySPACE
Title: [ANN][PRE-SALE] charitySPACE - place where you can help others and win a prize
Body: @tianyi321  We will exchange funds in crypto to FIAT currency. We do it publicly through the exchange. Then, our Company—registered on the territory of Poland—transfers FIAT currency funds to a bank account of a selected charity organization (a legally registered entity with the status of a foundation, or a public charity, or public benefit organization). All of the mentioned entities must have a legal status. We do not provide private bank accounts to people in need.  We are aware that the topic you raised is a real problem. If the collection model guarantees a contract, then the further flow of money depends only on us. We have talked about it with many foundations. Unfortunately, payment in crypto is not possible. As a company, we plan to disclose our finances. The company's annual tax return is also public. Unfortunately, it requires you to take certain actions. You must reach these documents.  As a team, we are considering the possibility of introducing a financial intermediary. It raises our credibility because it is he/she who powers the bank accounts of charitable organizations on our behalf. We are already in talks with several European financial houses. Another example of an intermediary can be the Humble Bundle service. They support payments in crypto.  The financial intermediary charges commissions. This commission is paid by us. It does not reduce the amount transferred to a charity.  We also know that Poland is not a large and well-known country. We are conducting talks with local foundations to embrace our company with their patronage.

Author: charitySPACE
Title: [ANN][PRE-SALE] charitySPACE - place where you can help others and win a prize
Body: The final recipient will be charitable organizations. Having the legal status of an organization. For organizational reasons and security reasons, the list of organizations available for giving will be prepared by us. This involves substantive and legal verification of these entities.  At the beginning, according to our roadmap, European charities will be available. We plan to operate globally until the end of 2018.  We will select new organizations as a team every week and by voting our website users will choose those that we will permanently add to our list. All of these interactions on the website will involve our CHT token  Funds from ICO are collected under the standard Ethereum contract. Of course, immediately for security reasons, they are transferred by this contract to other accounts. Tokens are granted automatically. Immediately after the contract is credited by the user. For contributions in altcoin, each user has their own individual address for payments. CHT tokens will be returned to user address without delay. Payments in BTC, BCH will be processed manually - in this case, tokens will be granted to you up to 24 hours.  Quote from: daenarys_stormborn on December 03, 2017, 03:41:25 PM a unique ico project, a charitable donation theme, a project like this that has to be multiplied because it is so important to humanity. can not wait to follow the bounty  Thank you very much. We invite you to ask us questions. We will answer every one   Quote from: ImHash on December 03, 2017, 02:05:54 PM More power sir irfan more power to you and to your charity attempts, I need to know some basic information about this lovely charity attempt,I have some ETH for a while now, I couldn't find a way to spend them on something useful, I also couldn't donate to millions of charity organizations myself, Now that you are here I'm gonna give them to you, I'm sure that you'll take care of the rest, Thank you for helping the poor and the needy, Now where is my reward? Only words that I could say, More power.   Thank you for good words. We invite you to the pre-sale, which will take place on December 20 and will last 7 days. We have reserved 2,500,000 tokens for this purpose. Attractive discount - 1 CHT = 0.0007 ETH.  In case of your questions, we remain at your disposal.

Author: p3ppymon
Title: [ANN][PRE-SALE] charitySPACE - place where you can help others and win a prize
Body: I really like charity projects. It is something to be proud of to help needed people. Would You develop independent programs as well as support existing charities? One concern is admin costs and the 25% given back to the donators. Isn’t 5% a high fee to charge (unicef is 1%)? Why give back something to token holders when you can reinvest such amount into the charity programmes or advertising, for example? A lottery is senseless for people who donate. No need to try to win money back which was donated to needy people.

Author: charitySPACE
Title: [ANN][PRE-SALE] charitySPACE - place where you can help others and win a prize
Body: Thank you for your comments.  The lottery element was from the beginning of our vision. It aims to increase the scale and conversions from users. We have been helping charity for many years. We know this market - if you can use the word "market" in this case. There is no such project in the blockchain. We do not know if the blockchain market is ready for it. We strongly believe that the community of this market is ready. The prize is to thank you for your loyalty.  Our commission is 5% because we have to have funds for the ongoing maintenance of the company. We must pay taxes, share commission with a financial intermediary, pay a fee in a blockchain, etc. A financial intermediary - as I wrote above - is necessary to maintain the transparency and credibility of our donations to charity. He also acts as a financial arbitrator.
